summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of the alleys adjoining Blocks 17, 18, 23, 24, 26 and 27, replat of Green Lake home addition, adjoining portion of Block 25, replat of Green Lake home addition, and adjoining portion of Block 1, Weaver's Green Lake Addition, being the alleys in the block bounded by East Green Lake Drive North, Stroud Avenue North, North 80th Street, Meridian Avenue North and North 78th Street; except portion of the alley lying westerly of Meridan Avenue North from approximately 70 feet south of North 80th Street to North 80th Street; by paving, etc.
